rows.label: soul24_P0101
rows.name:
Crash down on them like
 a tidal wave...

rows.label: soul24_P0102
rows.name:
We're taking the initiative...
 Close combat, team!

rows.label: soul24_P0103
rows.name:
I'll take point...
 Follow me, guys!

rows.label: soul24_P0201
rows.name:
Concentrate your fire.
 Let's end this quickly...

rows.label: soul24_P0202
rows.name:
I'll strike first...
 Back me up with a buff...

rows.label: soul24_P0203
rows.name:
We need to fight smart...
 Can you weaken them?

rows.label: soul24_P0301
rows.name:
Show no mercy...
 Let them hear you roar.

rows.label: soul24_P0302
rows.name:
I'll pile on the pressure.
 ...Some cover fire, please.

rows.label: soul24_P0303
rows.name:
Hit me with an aura and
 I'll go all in...

rows.label: soul24_P0401
rows.name:
Requesting first aid before
 they bleed me dry...

rows.label: soul24_P0402
rows.name:
Taking some serious hits...
 I need a power-up...

rows.label: soul24_P0403
rows.name:
All right... A little support
 and we should be just fine.

rows.label: soul24_P0501
rows.name:
This injury is serious... Some
 healing wouldn't go amiss.

rows.label: soul24_P0502
rows.name:
It's too soon to retreat...
 A heal would keep me going.

rows.label: soul24_P0503
rows.name:
Buff me and I'll fight until
 I'm bent and broken...

rows.label: soul24_P0601
rows.name:
I was foolish... Beat them for
 me. Do what I couldn't...

rows.label: soul24_P0602
rows.name:
Forget about me...
 Just keep firing away...

rows.label: soul24_P0603
rows.name:
I've failed... But you can still
 hold the line, with an aura...

rows.label: soul24_P0701
rows.name:
Just as planned... Engage
 them in close combat.

rows.label: soul24_P0702
rows.name:
Now's our chance.
 Let the bullets fly...!

rows.label: soul24_P0703
rows.name:
They're wide open... Perfect
 chance to weaken them.

rows.label: soul24_P0801
rows.name:
An effective attack... Melee
 attacks will work even better.

rows.label: soul24_P0802
rows.name:
It is destroyed...
 Let's end this from afar.

rows.label: soul24_P0803
rows.name:
Our target still won't fall...
 But if we weaken them...

rows.label: soul24_P0901
rows.name:
We're fighting well.
 Keep it up at range.

rows.label: soul24_P0902
rows.name:
The odds are in our favor...
 Now all we need is a buff...

rows.label: soul24_P0903
rows.name:
It's big, but we won't falter.
 With Overclock, we can win...

rows.label: soul24_P1001
rows.name:
That did it...! Now move in
 to finish them off...

rows.label: soul24_P1002
rows.name:
It's working... A good time
 for ranged attacks!

rows.label: soul24_P1003
rows.name:
Hobble them... It should
 really sting right now.

rows.label: soul24_P1101
rows.name:
Maybe this is our chance...?
 An aura, please.

rows.label: soul24_P1102
rows.name:
Tactics come in many forms.
 Even auras have their day.

rows.label: soul24_P1103
rows.name:
We need to boost morale...
 Could somebody buff us?

rows.label: soul24_P1201
rows.name:
Go Overclock. Join me in
 wanton destruction...!

rows.label: soul24_P1202
rows.name:
I will not stop... Just keep
 attacking, and don't let up.

rows.label: soul24_P1203
rows.name:
Fight beyond your limits.
 Engage Overclock...!

rows.label: soul24_C0101
rows.name:
Enemy down... Engage at
 close quarters.

rows.label: soul24_C0102
rows.name:
There are still enemies left...
 Take the initiative at range.

rows.label: soul24_C0103
rows.name:
The battle goes on...
 Just buff till it's enough.

rows.label: soul24_C0201
rows.name:
We're unstoppable. And an
 aura would bring it home...

rows.label: soul24_C0202
rows.name:
Hopeless aim. Buff me and
 I'll finish this even faster...

rows.label: soul24_C0203
rows.name:
Nice try...
 Now open fire...!

rows.label: soul24_C0301
rows.name:
We're fighting so gracefully...
 Mix in some melee attacks.

rows.label: soul24_C0302
rows.name:
This is peak performance.
 Now just focus your fire...

rows.label: soul24_C0303
rows.name:
We're doing it.
 Go all in...!

rows.label: soul24_C0401
rows.name:
Look at this weather...
 We should buff, just in case...

rows.label: soul24_C0402
rows.name:
This is hard to fight in...
 An aura should help.

rows.label: soul24_C0403
rows.name:
Weaken them... We can use
 this to our advantage.

rows.label: soul24_C0501
rows.name:
I'm switching position...
 Gimme a support buff.

rows.label: soul24_C0502
rows.name:
Changing formation...
 Buff me as necessary.

rows.label: soul24_C0503
rows.name:
Changing location... We can
 turn the tide with Overclock.

rows.label: soul24_C0601
rows.name:
Thank you, I'm fine now...
 Focus on close combat.

rows.label: soul24_C0602
rows.name:
Thank you... Now get the
 better of them from range...

rows.label: soul24_C0603
rows.name:
Good plan... You should prep
 with an aura as well.

rows.label: soul24_C0701
rows.name:
Keep up the buffs and
 something's sure to work...

rows.label: soul24_C0702
rows.name:
Thanks... We'll be even better
 positioned with a buff.

rows.label: soul24_C0703
rows.name:
Thank you... An aura will
 help turn the tables...

rows.label: soul24_C0801
rows.name:
I'll fight, no matter the cost.
 So long as the enemy falls...

rows.label: soul24_C0802
rows.name:
It's kill or be killed...!
 Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul24_C0803
rows.name:
This one's mine...
 Keep me covered.

rows.label: soul24_C0901
rows.name:
We're in a good position...
 Fire, now!

rows.label: soul24_C0902
rows.name:
Death from above...!
 Requesting suppressive fire.

rows.label: soul24_C0903
rows.name:
Beautiful positioning...
 Requesting cover fire.

rows.label: soul24_C1001
rows.name:
That went well... Let's deal
 with them at close quarters.

rows.label: soul24_C1002
rows.name:
Our opponent's pinned down.
 Why don't we finish them off...

rows.label: soul24_C1003
rows.name:
I'd use this opportunity
 to weaken them...

rows.label: soul24_C1101
rows.name:
I've got them immobilized...
 Move in for the kill.

rows.label: soul24_C1102
rows.name:
They've stopped...
 Focus all your fire...!

rows.label: soul24_C1103
rows.name:
The enemy's vulnerable. We
 should weaken them now...

rows.label: soul24_C1201
rows.name:
You snooze, you lose...
 Time for a wake-up call.

rows.label: soul24_C1202
rows.name:
Wake up, sleepyhead. We're
 punching you full of holes...

rows.label: soul24_C1203
rows.name:
Good night, sleep tight, and
 dream of melee attacks...

rows.label: soul24_C1301
rows.name:
I'll keep them busy... You lay
 into them with melee attacks.

rows.label: soul24_C1302
rows.name:
I won't let you go. Not until
 you're riddled with holes.

rows.label: soul24_C1303
rows.name:
Got you... But take care not
 to smack me here, guys...

rows.label: soul24_C1401
rows.name:
Rude... Can I get some
 maintenance...?

rows.label: soul24_C1402
rows.name:
This is fine. We can fight
 back with melee attacks...

rows.label: soul24_C1403
rows.name:
I can keep going, so long
 as there's cover fire...

rows.label: soul24_C1501
rows.name:
No time for regrets...
 Heal me up.

rows.label: soul24_C1502
rows.name:
Ugh... Maybe a buff can
 turn this around...

rows.label: soul24_C1503
rows.name:
Well, this is annoying... Let's
 reply with an Overclock...

rows.label: soul24_C1601
rows.name:
This thing can't run for much
 longer. Not without a buff...

rows.label: soul24_C1602
rows.name:
Low on fuel...
 Can you give some juice...?

rows.label: soul24_C1603
rows.name:
My Doll's about to go bust...
 Fix it, quickly...!
